posts.title: Introduction to Python Language
posts.excerpt: Go is an open-source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software and makes programmers more productive.

posts.title: How to execute SQL queries (Select, Update, Insert, Delete) effectively using Python
posts.excerpt: Connecting to the database is the most common need of any application. Most of the time developers end up writing the repeated code for each CRUD operation. But it is not an efficient way. Let me explain the below approach to handle the maintainability and reusability of the code.
